channel.title: The Trickman Times Video Game Show
channel.itunes:author: Trickman Terry
channel.description: Join Trickman Terry as he talks about video games (retro and new) as well as humorous musings from The Trickman Times website. You never know what he's going to say next!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Trickman Terry gives unique video game reviews, news and commentary. Xbox 360, PS3, Revolution, current generation, portables, arcade games, memoribilia, collecting and more.
channel.itunes:summary: Join Trickman Terry as he talks about video games (retro and new) as well as humorous musings from The Trickman Times website. You never know what he's going to say next!

item.title: The Trickman Times Video Game Show for Wednesday, March 29, 2006
item.itunes:author: Trickman Terry
item.description: Trickman Terry reintroduces himself to the podcasting world after a long time off. Is this REALLY the end of the missing co-host, Spike?? Yes, I got an Xbox 360, and I talk about my games and experiences with it.Time warp---Music clip Treat your mother right. Video game news with Champ Edwards (Hot Dog!!) and much more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Trickman Terry reintroduces himself to the podcasting world after a long time off. Is this REALLY the end of the missing co-host, Spike?? item.comments: Podcast about everything video game related.
